idea: ESES Couture Private Limited was incorporated on… The core business of the company is wholesale and retail of garments. We have chain number of stores which sells clothes for men and women under our own brand name of Amchoor , Shlok in female segment and Pontiac and white hanger in men section. In female section we sell kurti set, Sarees, lehanga, evening gown at various price range. In mens section we sell formal pants and shirts, denims, t-shirts, ethnic wear. We also do business online through our website. In wholesale business we sell our products in different parts of country
name: ESES COUTURE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

idea:
>O2O KART trying to help local shop keepers to sale there products online like Groceries, Books, Home appliance, Electronics, Fashion, Restaurant food, Street food, Sports wear & Equipment, Watches, Shoes, Kids toys, Huggies, Furniture, MADE IN INDIA PRODUCT, etc... one of the biggest platform where consumer will get everything with instant delivery.

> Help shop keepers to advertise there shop/product online.


> Consumer to receive there product in same day.


> By launching O2O KART it going to expand in Quick commerce.
